dialogue: You condense the power of the Orbs into a single white ball, thrusting it into the core of your being.
You feel demonic energies swell within you. Your body is permanently transformed. You can see much more than before and your power seems to only grow by the second.
As expected, man's greed knows no bound.
You've eschewed my Unity for your own vision. But tell me, are you strong enough to bring this world to its heels.
You wield the power of a god. Show me now that you are worthy of that title! 'Diamaou'!
